name: Where the Sidewalk Ends
description:
This is a flatgame I made in my New Directions in Virtual Space class taught by the one and only Lee Tusman. This game has hand-drawn sidewalk chalk visuals to coincide with Silverstein's infamous verses. I hope you enjoy playing this as much as I enjoyed making it! A huge thank you to Siobhan Gibson, my fellow classmates, and my good friend Shel Silverstein.

Soundtrack: "What did I do to be so Black and Blue" by Louis Armstrong
